mapper.select: select t.teacher_id as id, t.teacher_name as userName, t.phone, t.school_id, sa.authority_permission from teacher t left join teacher_role_rel trr on trr.teacher_id = t.teacher_id left join role r on r.role_id = trr.role_id left join role_authority_rel rar on rar.role_id = trr.role_id left join sys_authority sa on sa.authority_id = rar.authority_id where t.phone = #{userName} and t.is_del = 1
